thread.title: OnePlus 3T Midnight Black limited edition announced for Rs 34,999
thread.title_full: OnePlus 3T Midnight Black limited edition announced for Rs 34,999

title: OnePlus 3T Midnight Black limited edition announced for Rs 34,999
text: OnePlus 3T Midnight Black limited edition announced for Rs 34,999 OnePlus 3T Midnight Black limited edition announced for Rs 34,999 By - March 23, 2017 “The OnePlus 3T Midnight Black Edition goes on sale today via Amazon, oneplusstore.in and the OnePlus Experience store in Bengaluru” Last week, OnePlus announced the limited edition colette edition OnePlus 3T ( review ) in an all-black hue. Only 250 units of the device were made available through a pop-up store in Paris. Now OnePlus has announced a new Midnight Black limited edition OnePlus 3T that features a similar finish. OnePlus says the Midnight Black edition is constructed from space grade aluminium with three dark coatings, two sandblasting treatments and an anti-fingerprint treatment. This time around, Indian consumers will get the chance to purchase the Midnight Black edition through Amazon, oneplusstore.in and the OnePlus Experience Store in Bengaluru. The limited edition OnePlus 3T comes only in a 128GB storage option and costs Rs 34,999 – the same price as Gunmetal Grey 128GB variant. Pre-orders on Amazon begin today, with the sale starting at 2pm on both Amazon and oneplusstore.in . Only limited stocks are available, so if you’re interested in picking up the Midnight Black OnePlus 3T, we recommend you pre-register now. Facebook Comments
